title: HR Management Practical Skills Enhancement: Electric Bus Battery Condition Prediction Model Construction and Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Understand multi-task learning frameworks for designing electric bus battery state prediction models
Apply dynamic change and long-term dependency analysis methods using LSTM-Transformer hybrid models
Implement feature representation integrating vehicle, battery, and weather data to enhance model robustness
Acquire methods for evaluating residual range prediction accuracy under real-time operating conditions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
